data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio Couto Pereira have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Estadio Couto Pereira - Coritiba kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 1, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in Coritiba.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Important block from the Coritiba defence as Ytalo fires in a strike for Bragantino.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Coritiba.
Bragantino are coming forward and Luan Candido gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 6, Coritiba have a goal kick.
Bragantino push forward at Estadio Couto Pereira and Morato gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Coritiba defence.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 7, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino just outside Coritiba's area.
Lucas Evangelista (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Coritiba pushes forward through Robson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Morato (Bragantino) strikes at Estadio Couto Pereira but his header is cleared.
In the minute 13, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Coritiba throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Coritiba to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Bragantino's area.
In the minute 14, Free kick Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Coritiba.
Throw-in high up the field for Coritiba in Curitiba.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In the minute 20, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Leo Ortiz for Bragantino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Leo Ortiz is back on the pitch.
In the minute 22, Coritiba drives forward and Mattheus gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Throw-in for Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 26, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 28, Bragantino's Luan Candido misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 29, In Curitiba, Mattheus of Coritiba is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Curitiba Coritiba attack through Matheus Galdezani. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 30, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Coritiba.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Coritiba's half?
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 34, Bragantino are pushing forward but Morato's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Bragantino's Morato is on target but unsuccessful.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 38, Ytalo for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Coritiba a goal kick.
Ytalo of Bragantino smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Coritiba's Mailton gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 40, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Can Coritiba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Coritiba in the half of Bragantino.
Morato for Bragantino has been booked by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes and receives a first yellow card.
Sabino of Coritiba is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Lucas Evangelista of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 45, Bragantino's Ytalo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Bragantino's Aderlan misses with an attempt on goal.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Coritiba a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Coritiba in the half of Bragantino.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Bragantino have kicked-off the second half at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 46, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes blows against Coritiba's Robson for offside.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Coritiba's half.
In the minute 48, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 49, Bragantino's Claudinho gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Coritiba defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 50, Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Coritiba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick Coritiba.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Aderlan for Bragantino drives towards goal at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 58, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Coritiba's half.
Bragantino's Bruno Tubarao breaks free at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 59, Free kick Coritiba.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Coritiba have an attacking throw-in.
Coritiba have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 60, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Coritiba needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 62, Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a first substitution, with Tomas Cuello replacing Bruno Tubarao.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the home team a throw-in.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Bragantino are coming forward and Leo Ortiz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Coritiba goal kick.
Yan Sasse is replacing Rafinha for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brayan Lucumi is replacing Mattheus for the home team.
In the minute 67, Alerrandro is on a sub for Ytalo for Bragantino.
Coritiba have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Coritiba.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Coritiba.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Estadio Couto Pereira.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Rhodolfo (Coritiba) gets a yellow card.
Tomas Cuello gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bragantino.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
In the minute 77, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lucas Evangelista (Bragantino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
In the minute 78, The home team have replaced Ricardo Oliveira with Pablo Thomaz. This is the third substitution made today by Rodrigo Santana.
Coritiba make their fourth substitution with Osman replacing Robson.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Coritiba.
William Matheus (Coritiba) has received a yellow card from Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Throw-in for Bragantino close to the penalty box.
In the minute 80, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Coritiba.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Coritiba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba in their own half.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Coritiba territory.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Coritiba in their own half.
Yan Sasse (Coritiba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Coritiba's Pablo Thomaz gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Couto Pereira. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Morato with Eric Ramires.
Corner awarded to Coritiba.
William Matheus for Coritiba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Coritiba.
Rodrigo Santana is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Couto Pereira with Jonathan replacing Mailton.
In the minute 89, Coritiba are pushing forward but Brayan Lucumi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Curitiba Bragantino drive forward through Claudinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Claudinho of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
Coritiba have a goal kick.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Coritiba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Bragantino.
Goal kick for Coritiba at Estadio Couto Pereira.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a throw-in for Coritiba, close to Bragantino's area.
Can Coritiba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Coritiba throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
It's 0-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
At Estadio Couto Pereira, Matheus Galdezani has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Matheus Sales is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
